featured.title: BookWorm — Backend API
description: Developed a secure backend API for a book recommendation and reading tracker platform with Admin and User roles.
Implemented JWT-based authentication and authorization; protected all non-auth routes.
Built modular MVC architecture with strong validation and centralized error handling.
Enabled book & genre management, user libraries, progress tracking, reviews, and tutorials.

featured.title: LUMIJOBS — Team Project
description: Developed a full-stack hiring platform for job posting, applications, and interview scheduling.
Implemented role-based dashboards for Admins, Recruiters, and Candidates.
Built personalized profiles, resume management, and secure authentication flows.

others.title: OnTrip (Travel Guide Website)
description: Select your ideal tour package and choose your guide for a personalized travel experience.
Tourists can review guides and share travel stories on the platform.

others.title: GoExplor (Agency-based Travel Website)
description: Agency-based travel system: agencies add packages, tourists can book.
Users can add, update, and delete their own travel services/packages.

others.title: Brand-Shop (Online Shopping Website)
description: Customers can buy premium fashion/apparel from luxury brands.
Product categories and updates are managed with a clean UI experience.
Purchased products are shown inside the “My Cart” section.
